Articles.Content:
Whenever I load up a scenario/training mission - tested with "docking" and "Mun 2" scenarios - the craft instantly explodes.

So before I start creating and uploading logs and mod lists, did anyone else have this happening?

On 11/15/2015 at 4:45 AM, KerbMav said:

Whenever I load up a scenario/training mission - tested with "docking" and "Mun 2" scenarios - the craft instantly explodes.

So before I start creating and uploading logs and mod lists, did anyone else have this happening?

Did you ever find out why this was happening? It is happening to me on KSP 1.1

15 hours ago, blnk2007 said:

Did you ever find out why this was happening? It is happening to me on KSP 1.1

Nope. Been waiting for 1.1 - now waiting for 1.2 because I wanted to start playing again when the new telemetry system was included.
